title: Fluffy bunnies and MMR
body:
http://supercuter.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/bunny.jpg

That was just so that people would read this post.
But on the more serious note, I have a question regarding MMR at the end of a season.
I hit level 30 halfway this year, but currently, I don't think I'm in a position to play ranked yet, as I don't have a very ideal champion pool or complete rune pages. So I'm thinking of letting season 5 pass, and start ranked in season 6.

However, a friend of mine told me that even if I haven't played a single ranked game this season, season 5 will still count as my first season, thus my MMR will be affected significantly the next season.

Can some please confirm this? Rioters? Wise summoners?
Cheers,
-Anserem

replies.body:
First time provisionals your MMR is silver 4 area.

This doesn't change just because you were 30 and let a season pass.
your mmr will not change because it is at the default at the moment i think its like mid silver i think.
